dcterms:description: A dataset containing transaction flow records and descriptions of merchants from WeChat Pay, used for training, validating, and testing a multimodal matching model.
dcterms:title: WeChat Pay Dataset

dcterms:description: A sub-dataset extracted from the WeChat Pay dataset, consisting of 50,000 merchants for training, 1,000 for validation, and 1,000 for testing, collected over a month.
dcterms:title: 31-D dataset

dcterms:description: Another sub-dataset from the WeChat Pay dataset, consisting of 50,000 merchants for training, 1,000 for validation, and 1,000 for testing, collected over a week.
dcterms:title: 7-D dataset
